mainText: While I wasn't an Apple user, I always deeply admired Steve Jobs for his ingenuity and entrepreneurship.  He raised the bar for all others aspiring to be successful in business and the pursuit of their dreams.  Quite simply, the world will be less without him.  My sincerest sympathies go out to Steve's family and friends in this time of grief.
header: The end of an era - RIP Steve Jobs
author: Michelle
